body_html:
@jart @chihuahua
The fact that the open-source TensorBoard build is broken is a known issue and one that frustrates us a lot. I think on the master branch chihuahua put out some new instructions in development.md that solve some of this. We're hard at work on getting a bazel build working so we can leave all this gulp/npm stuff behind.

body:
@jart @chihuahua 
The fact that the open-source TensorBoard build is broken is a known issue and one that frustrates us a lot. I think on the master branch chihuahua put out some new instructions in development.md that solve some of this. We're hard at work on getting a bazel build working so we can leave all this gulp/npm stuff behind.
